decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The use hereby permitted shall be carried out for a limited period, being the period of one year from the date of this letter.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (738 LOC and 738 SK001A Received: 24/10/2014 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The area indicated on the ground floor plan as 'room proposed to be used for taxi office' area shall not be used as waiting/leisure area for drivers, radio control operators.
description: Continued use of room in rear annexe as a taxi office following expiry of temporary use permitted under reference number 00094/74/P9 dated 20/12/2013
